name: Blocking Over it, with Rapalher Games
name_original: Blocking Over it, with Rapalher Games
description:
This is a game in wich you are a block and you have to jump until you get 4 keys and then open a door. Is a hardcore game, you will die and die also fall, untill you are one with the game. This game is based in going over it, but inspired by golfing over it. I hope you like it.

The Motionless Voyage name is because it can be also called like this.

Warning: Is very stressfull. I don't take care of any thing you do because of this game.

Youtube:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCA9DMaT1r_Rd1w8Lq30wpEg

Discord:https://discord.gg/w98kCN8Quf
